about.title: About Me
about.desc: Dynamic and skilled Full Stack Developer with 1 years of experience in designing, implementing, and maintaining web applications. Proficient in both front-end and back-end technologies, with a strong focus on delivering high-quality, scalable solutions. Seeking to leverage expertise in software development to contribute to innovative projects and drive business growth.

higherEdu.title: 10th/12th
higherEdu.desc: I completed my 10th and 12th-grade education from Bharat Mata Hr. Sec. School with a focus on achieving academic excellence and developing a strong foundation in key subjects. During this period, I gained proficiency in subjects such as Mathematics, Science, English, and Social Studies, demonstrating consistent dedication to learning and achieving high grades

underGrad.title: Bachelor of Computer Application
underGrad.desc: I completed my Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA) degree from Ravi Sankar Sukla University with a focus on equipping myself with a comprehensive understanding of computer science principles and practical skills. Throughout my BCA education, I engaged in a diverse range of coursework covering areas such as Database Management Systems, Object-Oriented Programming, Web Development, Data Structures and Algorithms, and Software Engineering. This academic foundation enabled me to delve into various programming languages, including Java, C++, and Python, while also honing my skills in web development technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

Extras.title: Full Stack Development
Extras.desc: I pursued a comprehensive Full Stack Development education, mastering both front-end and back-end technologies. Through immersive coursework, I gained proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frameworks like React and Angular for dynamic front-end development. On the back end, I honed skills in server-side programming using Node.js and explored database management with technologies like MongoDB and SQL. Additionally, I acquired knowledge in version control systems such as Git and gained hands-on experience deploying applications on cloud platforms like AWS or Heroku. This Full Stack education equipped me with a diverse skill set to develop scalable, user-centric web applications efficiently.

Extras.title: AWS Cloud Practitioner
Extras.desc: I completed AWS Cloud Practitioner education, gaining foundational knowledge in cloud concepts, AWS services, security, and architecture. Through this program, I acquired proficiency in navigating the AWS Management Console, understanding AWS pricing models, and basic cloud infrastructure concepts. I learned to deploy and manage services such as EC2 instances, S3 storage, and RDS databases effectively. Additionally, I developed skills in implementing security measures and best practices for data protection on AWS. This education provided me with a solid understanding of cloud computing fundamentals, preparing me to contribute effectively to cloud-based projects and initiatives.
